version_description:
* Introducing profile boosting
* Instant photo access
* Matches screen re-designed
* Minor bugs fixing
* General improvement

* Try HUD Premium for Free - Unlimited messages, unlimited matches, premium filters and so on.
* Send unlimited messages for free!
* UX/UI design improvement
* Real-time match updates

* iPhone X and iOS 11 compatibility
* User interface and experience improvement
* Major improvement on match searching results and messages
* Fixed the crashing bug for editing my profile
* Major bug fixes for messages, matches and boosted profiles
* Minor bug fixes
* Speed improvement

* Fix for message screen crashing in iOS 9 & 10
* Minor bug fixes

* Support for iPhone X
* Improved and simplified wink system
* Simplified email sign up
* Bug fixes for iOS 9 & 10
* Improved UI
Thanks for using HUD! We are regularly updating and improving the app to ensure you have a faster, more reliable user experience.

* Small UI improvement
* Minor bug fixes

!Please do NOT update!
This update contains a bug which will crash the app, please wait for the next update instead!

* Minor design improvement
* Bug fixes

* Send photos and emojis in chatting
* UI improvement
* Bug fixes

Chat features:
+ Introducing the new HUD real-time chat with FREE Unlimited messaging for all users!
+ Removed winks

App features:
+ New logo
+ Rewind disliked profiles

Female-friendly features:
+ Photos received will automatically be blurred
+ Chat requests feature for women to keep inbox uncluttered
